short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplest way to record from your camera and screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to share your screen and camera recording for cases like making Youtube videos, reporting technical issues, product demos or how-to tutorials? Just Record is the simplest app to do it

🆓 Free to use
💡 Dead simple
🛬 No signup required
🐾 No watermarks
🫶 Record unlimited videos
🪧 No ads and honor your privacy
